1 
CURRICULUM VITAE 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
Full name 
: TRAN Anh Dung 
Date of birth 
: 04th October, 1991 
Place of birth 
: Thai Binh City 
Material status 
: Single 
Mobile phone 
Email 
Address 
: (+84)379 979 357 
: anhdung410@gmail.com 
: H’Bong Ward, Chu Se District, Gia Lai Province 
EDUCATION 
2009 -2014 
2012 
Bachelor, University of Natural Science - VNUHCMC, Department 
of Physics and Computer Science. 
Certificate in Object Oriented  Programming with C++ 
EXPERIENCES RECORD 
Aug 2017 - Present 
Working at DongA Bank 
- Manage over 400 servers both physical and virtual servers, 
include : 
* Linux : 
- Participate in installing, configuring, maintaining, operating 
and troubleshooting infrastructure service such as : DNS, 
DHCP, LDAP, Apache HTTPD as reverse proxy, Internet 
Proxy, Zimbra Mail, IM chat OpenFire, NFS, Samba, FTP, 
RedHat Satellite.  
* Windows : 
- Manage Active Directory server, CA server, IIS server, 
WSUS server, File Server. 
* VMware : 
- Deploy VMware ESXi on most physical servers and manage 
them by vCenter server 
- Participate in project to build a disaster recovery datacenter 
using VMware SRM solution. 
- Provide OS platform and server resources for requirements of 
database team and developing team on Testing/UAT, Staging 
and Product enviroment. 
- Monitor and troubleshoot system errors by using VMware 
Operation Manager; resolve problems on VMware system. 
* Others: 
- Manage backup & restore system using EMC Networker 
solution, EMC Data Domain, HP LTO6 Tape Library, IBM 
LTO4 Tape Library. 
- Competent in working with mainframe server and blade 
server of HP, Dell or Cisco manufacturers. 
- Maintain and monitor APC’s UPS, Cooling, FM200 system in 
datacenter. 
Feb 2017 – Aug 2017  
Working at FORIX LLC 
- Deploying networking system for company: Swich, Router, Load 
Balancing, WiFi, … 
- 
Managing server, mail system and network services (basic). 
- Technical support to each team at company (Level 1). 
Oct 2013 – Dec 2016 
Working at HONEYNET Company and R&D at VNU-HCM 
- Researching and developing in CDN, Cloud system 
2 
- Managing VMWARE, CDN, UNIX system 
Built the farm servers for Yeu The Thao company 
- Deployed a virtualization system (includes: websites, databases, 
apache/nginx, varnish-cache, memcached, …) 
- Optimized for this system that adapt over 10,000 CCU 
- Built the backup/restore system 
Optimization website system at Sun Flower Media company 
- 
Build a web system for 5,000 connections concurrent 
- 
Deployed the RTMP protocol to streaming a video (Replace HTTP 
standard protocol) 
- 
Optimized database with Master-Slave replication model 
Internship at Network Department - Viet Nam National 
Jun 2012 – Sep 2013  
University HCMC (VNU-HCM) 
- 
R&D at VNU-HCM (Unix, Network, Services and Open Source) 
SKILLS 
Good English in speaking and writing 
Good team work abilities 
Experienced in VMware virtualization, Unix OS, Windows Server and Streaming (VoD, 
Live), Load balancer, FailOver, Open source, Troubleshooting. 
Ability to program with C #, C++, PHP, Shell scripts (bash, sh, csh)  
HOBBIES 
Music 
Sports 
Travel 
3 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
